fields.name: leading
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.leading} A widget to display before the toolbar's [title].

fields.name: automaticallyImplyLeading
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.automaticallyImplyLeading} Controls whether we should try to imply the leading widget if null.

fields.name: title
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.title} The primary widget displayed in the app bar.

fields.name: actions
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.actions} A list of Widgets to display in a row after the [title] widget.

fields.name: flexibleSpace
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.flexibleSpace} This widget is stacked behind the toolbar and the tab bar. Its height will be the same as the app bar's overall height.

fields.name: bottom
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.bottom} This widget appears across the bottom of the app bar.

fields.name: elevation
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.elevation} The z-coordinate at which to place this app bar relative to its parent.

fields.name: scrolledUnderElevation
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.scrolledUnderElevation} The elevation that will be used if this app bar has something scrolled underneath it.

fields.name: notificationPredicate
fields.desc: A check that specifies which child's [ScrollNotification]s should be listened to.

fields.name: shadowColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.shadowColor} The color of the shadow below the app bar.

fields.name: surfaceTintColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.surfaceTintColor} The color of the surface tint overlay applied to the app bar's background color to indicate elevation.

fields.name: shape
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.shape} The shape of the app bar's [Material] as well as its shadow.

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.backgroundColor} The fill color to use for an app bar's [Material].

fields.name: foregroundColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.foregroundColor} The default color for [Text] and [Icon]s within the app bar.

fields.name: iconTheme
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.iconTheme} The color, opacity, and size to use for toolbar icons.

fields.name: actionsIconTheme
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.actionsIconTheme} The color, opacity, and size to use for the icons that appear in the app bar's [actions].

fields.name: primary
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.primary} Whether this app bar is being displayed at the top of the screen.

fields.name: centerTitle
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.centerTitle} Whether the title should be centered.

fields.name: excludeHeaderSemantics
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.excludeHeaderSemantics} Whether the title should be wrapped with header [Semantics].

fields.name: titleSpacing
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.titleSpacing} The spacing around [title] content on the horizontal axis. This spacing is applied even if there is no [leading] content or [actions]. If you want [title] to take all the space available, set this value to 0.0.

fields.name: toolbarOpacity
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.toolbarOpacity} How opaque the toolbar part of the app bar is.

fields.name: bottomOpacity
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.bottomOpacity} How opaque the bottom part of the app bar is.

fields.name: preferredSize
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.preferredSize} A size whose height is the sum of [toolbarHeight] and the [bottom] widget's preferred height.

fields.name: toolbarHeight
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.toolbarHeight} Defines the height of the toolbar component of an [AppBar].

fields.name: leadingWidth
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.leadingWidth} Defines the width of [AppBar.leading] widget.

fields.name: toolbarTextStyle
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.toolbarTextStyle} The default text style for the AppBar's [leading], and [actions] widgets, but not its [title].

fields.name: titleTextStyle
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.titleTextStyle} The default text style for the AppBar's [title] widget.

fields.name: systemOverlayStyle
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.systemOverlayStyle} Specifies the style to use for the system overlays (e.g. the status bar on Android or iOS, the system navigation bar on Android).

fields.name: forceMaterialTransparency
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.forceMaterialTransparency} Forces the AppBar's Material widget type to be [MaterialType.transparency] (instead of Material's default type).

fields.name: useDefaultSemanticsOrder
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.useDefaultSemanticsOrder} Whether to use the default semantic ordering for the app bar's children for accessibility traversal order.

fields.name: clipBehavior
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.Material.clipBehavior}

fields.name: actionsPadding
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.appbar.actionsPadding} The padding between the [actions] and the end of the AppBar.
